metadata.name: WerFault LSASS Process Memory Dump
metadata.comment: Detects WerFault creating a dump file with a name that indicates that the dump file could be an LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\werfault.exe') AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\lsass')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('lsass.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects WerFault creating a dump file with a name that indicates that the dump file could be an LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials
